description:
Several disappointments:-
* Couldn't get any camera to display - and that was 3 cameras including laptop webcam and 2 IP cameras that work across the network
* Display overly complicated and no clues as to why there was no image - nor how to get any.
* Trial period, but I can't be bothered to use it for the 30 days and will remove it after c. 30 minutes!
Very disappointed.
summary: Couldn't get it to show a single camera - not even laptop camera

description: bedauere die Testversion installiert zu haben
summary: Blockiert kostenlose Programme nach seinem Testende Vorsicht!

description: Hat beim Versuch das Program im Terminal zu entfernen, das komplette Ubuntu 20.04 gelöscht. Außer mit dem Terminal kein Entfernen der Dateien möglich gewesen.
